summary.para: Retrieves a pointer to the object that is hosting this proxy.

param.name: riid
param.para: Interface identifier (IID) of the requested interface.

param.name: ppv
param.para: Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Retrieves a pointer to the remote object for which this object is a proxy.

param.name: riid
param.para: Interface identifier (IID) of the requested interface.

param.name: ppv
param.para: Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Exposed by objects that act as a proxy for a remote object. To obtain a pointer to this interface, call with the service identifier MF_REMOTE_PROXY.
